issues.description: The template and problem specification define PersonService.getAllPersons(PersonSortingOptions) (Part 3), but the solution’s PersonService and PersonResource use getAllPersons(PersonSortingOptions, boolean includeInactive). This parameter mismatch prevents students from following the spec or compiling against the solution.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the service signature with the specification by removing the extra boolean parameter (or updating the spec to include it). For example, change the solution’s getAllPersons to accept only PersonSortingOptions and handle filtering without a second parameter.
